name: Web / Lan Poker 8 - Texas Holdem
description:
Web / Lan Poker 8 ( Texas Holdem ) where up to 8 people can play together with their Android smartphone and on computers with linux, mac and windows.
It's a multiplayer game, with computer bots.
One smartphone is the server and the others are clients.
To play through wLan the designed server player has to click on "Host" button then share his local device IP which is written on the left up corner and looks like "192.168.*.*", the other players should write this IP in the field under "Enter Server IP:".
To play through Internet the designed server player is the one behind a router with uPnP enabled. After clicking "Host" the IP is still the local IP and for playing through Internet this local IP doesn't works. The server player have to google "my IP" or to find it through the router configurations.
At the End of a game it will show you if you have won the game or not. Disconnection and new connection is possible.
If you pause the game with the home button or switch to an other app you'll be disconnected.
If it doesn't work the first time try to destroy the launched app and to restart it.

Any comments are welcome
